header: SERMON SERIES FOR ADVENT  “The Heart of Christmas”
content: There are so many Christmas traditions–Christmas trees, colorful lights and decorating, mistletoe, wreaths, and family get-togethers and gift-giving. As wonderful as all these traditions and activities are, it can be easy to actually miss the Heart of Christmas–the hope, peace, joy and love we receive from the birth of Jesus. Our Advent Sermon Series begins December 3 and will end December 24. Please note that on December 24, we will have worship at 10am that morning AND our Christmas Eve worship at 7:30pm.
